scripts.deploy-functions:dev: gcloud functions deploy get-trends-test --trigger-http --runtime=nodejs18 --gen2 --entry-point getTrends --env-vars-file env/TEST.yaml
scripts.deploy-functions:prod: gcloud functions deploy get-trends --trigger-http --runtime=nodejs18 --gen2 --entry-point getTrends --env-vars-file env/PROD.yaml
